articles.title: Advancing science and math with GPT-5.2
articles.summary: Researchers are leveraging GPT-5.2, a cutting-edge AI model, to accelerate breakthroughs in science and math by automating complex calculations and generating novel solutions. This innovative application of AI has the potential to revolutionize fields such as physics, engineering, and computer science. By augmenting human capabilities, GPT-5.2 is poised to drive significant advancements in scientific discovery and problem-solving.

articles.title: Increasing revenue 300% by bringing AI to SMBs
articles.summary: A new initiative is bringing AI technology to small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs), resulting in a significant 300% increase in revenue. This innovative approach is democratizing access to AI, enabling SMBs to leverage its power to drive growth and competitiveness. By bridging the AI gap, these businesses can now tap into new opportunities and stay ahead in their respective markets.

articles.title: The Walt Disney Company and OpenAI reach landmark agreement to bring beloved characters to Sora
articles.summary: The Walt Disney Company has partnered with OpenAI to integrate its iconic characters into the Sora platform, marking a significant collaboration between entertainment and AI. This landmark agreement aims to revolutionize the way fans interact with beloved Disney characters, potentially paving the way for new immersive experiences. By leveraging OpenAI's technology, Disney can breathe new life into its characters, expanding their reach and engagement in innovative ways.

articles.title: Introducing GPT-5.2
articles.summary: The latest iteration of the GPT series, GPT-5.2, has been introduced, boasting enhanced language understanding and generation capabilities. This update promises to revolutionize natural language processing tasks, enabling more accurate and human-like interactions with AI models. With GPT-5.2, users can expect significant improvements in text analysis, content creation, and conversational AI applications.

articles.title: Update to GPT-5 System Card: GPT-5.2
articles.summary: OpenAI has released an update to its GPT-5 system, introducing GPT-5.2, which promises improved performance and capabilities. This update enhances the language model's ability to generate human-like text and respond to user input. The GPT-5.2 update is expected to have a significant impact on various applications, including chatbots, language translation, and content generation.

articles.title: Deepening our partnership with the UK AI Security Institute
articles.summary: A leading tech company has strengthened its partnership with the UK AI Security Institute to advance AI security research and development. This collaboration aims to enhance the security and trustworthiness of AI systems, driving innovation in the field. By combining their expertise, they will work towards creating more robust and reliable AI solutions.

articles.title: Strengthening our partnership with the UK government to support prosperity and security in the AI era
articles.summary: A leading tech company has announced a strengthened partnership with the UK government to drive AI innovation and support national prosperity and security. This collaboration aims to harness AI's potential to boost economic growth, improve public services, and enhance cybersecurity. By working together, the company and the UK government seek to establish the country as a global leader in responsible AI development and deployment.

articles.title: FACTS Benchmark Suite: Systematically evaluating the factuality of large language models
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced the FACTS Benchmark Suite, a comprehensive tool for evaluating the factuality of large language models, aiming to improve their accuracy and reliability. This suite assesses models' ability to distinguish between factual and non-factual information, a crucial step in developing more trustworthy AI systems. By systematically evaluating factuality, the FACTS Benchmark Suite has the potential to significantly enhance the performance of language models in real-world applications.

articles.title: Engineering more resilient crops for a warming climate
articles.summary: Scientists are developing more resilient crops to combat the impacts of climate change, using advanced engineering techniques to enhance their ability to withstand rising temperatures and extreme weather conditions. This innovation aims to ensure global food security by creating crops that can thrive in a warming climate. By doing so, researchers hope to reduce crop losses and promote sustainable agriculture practices.

articles.title: AlphaFold: Five years of impact
articles.summary: AlphaFold, a revolutionary AI protein-folding model, has made significant strides in the field of biology over the past five years, enabling breakthroughs in disease research and drug discovery. Its ability to accurately predict protein structures has far-reaching implications for our understanding of human health and the development of new treatments. By accelerating scientific progress, AlphaFold is transforming the field of biomedicine and paving the way for future innovations.

articles.title: New in llama.cpp: Model Management
articles.summary: The latest update to llama.cpp introduces model management capabilities, allowing users to easily manage and switch between different AI models. This innovation streamlines the development process and enables more efficient experimentation with various models. By simplifying model management, llama.cpp enhances its usability and flexibility for developers working with AI applications.

articles.title: Codex is Open Sourcing AI models
articles.summary: Codex, a leader in AI technology, is open-sourcing its AI models, making them freely available for developers to use and build upon. This move is expected to accelerate innovation in the field of artificial intelligence and facilitate the creation of new applications. By open-sourcing its models, Codex is democratizing access to AI and empowering a wider community of developers to drive technological advancements.

articles.title: Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker: Cost-efficient Frontier Multimodal Performance
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker, a cost-efficient AI model that achieves state-of-the-art performance in multimodal tasks, such as text, image, and video processing. This innovation enables more efficient use of computational resources, making multimodal AI applications more accessible and affordable. By reducing costs, Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker has the potential to accelerate the development of AI-powered solutions in various industries.

articles.title: Introducing swift-huggingface: The Complete Swift Client for Hugging Face
articles.summary: The swift-huggingface library provides a complete Swift client for Hugging Face, allowing developers to easily integrate AI models into their iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS apps. This innovation enables seamless access to Hugging Face's vast model repository, streamlining the development of AI-powered applications. By bridging the gap between Swift and Hugging Face, developers can now build more intelligent and interactive apps.

articles.title: DeepMath: A lightweight math reasoning Agent with smolagents
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced DeepMath, a lightweight math reasoning agent that utilizes smolagents, a novel approach to artificial intelligence. This innovation enables DeepMath to solve complex mathematical problems with increased efficiency and accuracy, making it a significant breakthrough in the field of AI-powered math reasoning. By leveraging smolagents, DeepMath has the potential to revolutionize math education and problem-solving applications.

articles.title: GPT-5.2
articles.summary: Researchers have unveiled GPT-5.2, a significant upgrade to the GPT language model, boasting improved performance and efficiency. This new iteration enhances text generation capabilities, allowing for more coherent and contextually relevant responses. With GPT-5.2, we can expect more advanced AI-powered tools for applications like chatbots, language translation, and content creation.

articles.title: Show HN: Local Privacy Firewall-blocks PII and secrets before ChatGPT sees them
articles.summary: A new open-source tool, Local Privacy Firewall, has been introduced to block personally identifiable information (PII) and sensitive secrets from being shared with ChatGPT, enhancing user privacy and security. This innovative firewall acts as a local proxy, filtering out sensitive data before it reaches the AI model. By doing so, it helps protect users' confidential information from being exposed or stored by third-party services like ChatGPT.
